name: Pain for Pain
title: La Signora: Pain for Pain
in_play_description: When this character takes at least 3 DMG: Negates 1 DMG, then apply Sheer Cold or Blazing Heat to the opposing active character based on La Signora's state. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against La Signora at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
Can only be played if your active character is La Signora: When entering play, generate 3 Elemental Dice of the same Type as La Signora.
When this character takes at least 3 DMG: Negates 1 DMG, then apply Sheer Cold or Blazing Heat to the opposing active character based on La Signora's state. (Once per Round)
(Your deck must contain La Signora to add this card to your deck.)
